method.name: textAlign
method.description:
CENTER : String = "center"</br>
[静态] 指定与容器中心对齐。</br>
TextAlign</br>
END : String = "end"</br>
[静态] 指定结束边缘对齐 - 文本与书写顺序的结束端对齐。</br>
TextAlign</br>
JUSTIFY : String = "justify"</br>
[静态] 指定文本在行内两端对齐，以便位于容器空间范围内。</br>
TextAlign</br>
LEFT : String = "left"</br>
[静态] 指定左边缘对齐。</br>
TextAlign</br>
RIGHT : String = "right"</br>
[静态] 指定右边缘对齐。</br>
TextAlign</br>
START : String = "start"</br>
[静态] 指定起始边缘对齐 - 文本与书写顺序的起始端对齐。 </br>

method.name: text
method.description: default TextFieldAutoSize.NONE

method.name: verticalAlign
method.description:
Constant Defined By </br>
BOTTOM : String = "bottom" </br>
[static] Specifies alignment with the bottom edge of the frame. VerticalAlign </br>
JUSTIFY : String = "justify" </br>
[static] Specifies vertical line justification within the frame VerticalAlign </br>
MIDDLE : String = "middle" </br>
[static] Specifies alignment with the middle of the frame. VerticalAlign </br>
TOP : String = "top" </br>
[static] Specifies alignment with the top edge of the frame. VerticalAlign </br>
FormatValue.INHERIT

这个已经废弃了，请改用: 不滚动[ILabel.multiline = true;ILabel.autoBound = true;],滚动[ILabel.multiline = true;ILabel.autoBound = false;]

classRec.name: SimpleCollectionItem
classRec.description: The SimpleCollectionItem class defines a single item in an inspectable property that represents a data provider. A SimpleCollectionItem object is a collection list item that contains only label and data properties--for example, a ComboBox or List component.
classRec.internal:
Is this revised description correct?
Adobe: [LM} Yes, its ok.

method.name: SimpleCollectionItem
method.description: Creates a new SimpleCollectionItem object.

method.name: data
method.description: The data property of the object.

method.name: label
method.description: The label property of the object. The default value is label(n), where n is the ordinal index.

method.name: childs
method.description: 子菜单数据

classRec.name: DataProvider
classRec.description:
The DataProvider class provides methods and properties that allow you to query and modify the data in any list-based component--for example, in a List, DataGrid, TileList, or ComboBox component.

A data provider is a linear collection of items that serve as a data source--for example, an array. Each item in a data provider is an object or XML object that contains one or more fields of data. You can access the items that are contained in a data provider by index, by using the DataProvider.getItemAt() method.

Event.name: dataChange
Event.description: Dispatched after the data is changed.

Event.name: preDataChange
Event.description: Dispatched before the data is changed.

method.name: DataProvider
method.description:
Creates a new DataProvider object using a list, XML instance or an array of data objects
as the data source.
method.param: data The data that is used to create the DataProvider.

method.name: addItemAt
method.description:
Adds a new item to the data provider at the specified index.
If the index that is specified exceeds the length of the data provider,
the index is ignored.
method.param: item An object that contains the data for the item to be added.
index The index at which the item is to be added.
method.throws:
RangeError The specified index is less than 0 or greater than or equal
to the length of the data provider.

method.name: addItem
method.description: Appends an item to the end of the data provider.
method.param: item The item to be appended to the end of the current data provider.

method.name: addItemsAt
method.description: Adds several items to the data provider at the specified index and dispatches a DataChangeType.ADD event.
method.param: items The items to be added to the data provider.
index The index at which the items are to be inserted.
method.throws:
RangeError The specified index is less than 0 or greater than or equal
to the length of the data provider.

method.name: addItems
method.description: Appends multiple items to the end of the DataProvider and dispatches a DataChangeType.ADD event. The items are added in the order in which they are specified.
method.param: items The items to be appended to the data provider.

method.name: clone
method.description: Creates a copy of the current DataProvider object.
method.return: A new instance of this DataProvider object.

method.name: concat
method.description: Concatenates the specified items to the end of the current data provider. This method dispatches a DataChangeType.ADD event.
method.internal:
Is this method any different than addItems()? It's not clear.
I also thing "concatenates the items o sounds odd. Perhaps
the concatenated items are added to the end of the data provider?
method.param: items The items to be added to the data provider.

method.name: getItemAt
method.description: Returns the item at the specified index.
method.param: index Location of the item to be returned.
method.return: The item at the specified index.
method.throws:
RangeError The specified index is less than 0 or greater than
or equal to the length of the data provider.

method.name: getItemIndex
method.description: Returns the index of the specified item.
method.param: item The item to be located.
method.return: The index of the specified item, or -1 if the specified item is not found.

method.name: invalidateItemAt
method.description:
Invalidates the item at the specified index. An item is invalidated after it is
changed; the DataProvider automatically redraws the invalidated item.
method.param: index Index of the item to be invalidated.
method.throws:
RangeError The specified index is less than 0 or greater than
or equal to the length of the data provider.

method.name: invalidateItem
method.description:
Invalidates the specified item. An item is invalidated after it is
changed; the DataProvider automatically redraws the invalidated item.

method.name: invalidate
method.description: Invalidates all the data items that the DataProvider contains and dispatches a DataChangeEvent.INVALIDATE_ALL event. Items are invalidated after they are changed; the DataProvider automatically redraws the invalidated items.

method.name: merge
method.description: Appends the specified data into the data that the data provider contains and removes any duplicate items. This method dispatches a DataChangeType.ADD event.
method.param: data Data to be merged into the data provider.

method.name: removeAll
method.description: Removes all items from the data provider and dispatches a DataChangeType.REMOVE_ALL event.

method.name: removeItemAt
method.description: Removes the item at the specified index and dispatches a DataChangeType.REMOVE event.
method.param: index Index of the item to be removed.
method.throws:
RangeError The specified index is less than 0 or greater than
or equal to the length of the data provider.

method.name: removeItem
method.description: Removes the specified item from the data provider and dispatches a DataChangeType.REMOVE event.

method.name: replaceItemAt
method.description: Replaces the item at the specified index and dispatches a DataChangeType.REPLACE event.
method.param: index The index of the item to be replaced.
method.throws:
RangeError The specified index is less than 0 or greater than
or equal to the length of the data provider.

method.name: replaceItem
method.description: Replaces an existing item with a new item and dispatches a DataChangeType.REPLACE event.
method.param: oldItem The item to be replaced.
method.throws: RangeError The item could not be found in the data provider.

method.name: sortOn
method.description: Sorts the items that the data provider contains by the specified field and dispatches a DataChangeType.SORT event. The specified field can be a string, or an array of string values that designate multiple fields to sort on in order of precedence.
method.internal:
If an array of string values is passed, does the sort take place in
the order that the string values are specified? Also, it might be helpful if "options
for sorting" was more explicit. I wondered if that meant sort type, like merge sort
or bubble sort, for example, but when I looked up "uniquesort" it seemed like not.
method.param:
fieldName The item field by which to sort. This value can be a string
or an array of string values.
method.return: The return value depends on whether the method receives any arguments. For more information, see the Array.sortOn() method. If the sortOption property is set to Array.UNIQUESORT, this method returns 0.

method.name: sort
method.description: Sorts the items that the data provider contains and dispatches a DataChangeType.SORT event.
method.param: sortArg The arguments to use for sorting.
method.return: The return value depends on whether the method receives any arguments. See the Array.sort() method for more information. This method returns 0 when the sortOption property is set to Array.UNIQUESORT.

method.name: toArray
method.description: Creates an Array object representation of the data that the data provider contains.
method.return: An Array object representation of the data that the data provider contains.

method.name: toString
method.description: Creates a string representation of the data that the data provider contains.
method.return: A string representation of the data that the data provider contains.

method.name: length
method.description: The number of items that the data provider contains.

classRec.name: DataChangeType
classRec.description: The DataChangeType class defines constants for the DataChangeEvent.changeType event. These constants are used by the DataChangeEvent class to identify the type of change that was applied to the data in a list-based component such as a List, ComboBox, TileList, or DataGrid.

field.name: ADD
field.description: Items were added to the data provider.
field.internal: The word "model" was replaced with "data provider" above. What should it say?

field.name: CHANGE
field.description:
A change was made to the component data. This value does not affect the
component data that it describes.

field.name: INVALIDATE
field.description: A change was made to the data contained in an item.

field.name: REMOVE_ALL
field.description: All items were removed from the data provider.
field.internal: The word "model" was replaced with "data provider" above. What should it say?

field.name: REMOVE
field.description: Items were removed from the data provider.
field.internal: The word "model" was replaced with "data provider" above. What should it say?

field.name: REPLACE
field.description: The items in the data provider were replaced by new items.
field.internal: I used "data provider" here instead of the word "model". Correct?

field.name: SORT
field.description:
The data provider was sorted. This constant is used to indicate
a change in the order of the data, not a change in
the data itself.
field.internal: The word "model" was replaced with "data provider" above. What should it say?

field.name: COMPONENT_CREATE_UI
field.description: 当组件执行 create 方法时，调度

field.name: TEXT_LINK
field.description: ILabel 文本 a 标签 event:eventType 事件 点击事件

field.name: VIEW_DISPOSE
field.description: 组件所在的视图被 被释放

classRec.name: DataChangeEvent
classRec.description:
The DataChangeEvent class defines the event that is dispatched when the data that is associated with a component changes. This event is used by the List, DataGrid, TileList, and ComboBox components.

This class provides the following event:

  • DataChangeEvent.DATA_CHANGE: dispatched when the component data changes.

method.name: DataChangeEvent
method.description: Creates a new DataChangeEvent object with the specified parameters.
method.param: eventType The type of change event.

changeType The type of change that was made. The DataChangeType class defines the possible values for
this parameter.
items A list of items that were changed.
startIndex The index of the first item that was changed.
endIndex The index of the last item that was changed.

method.name: clone
method.description:
Creates a copy of the DataEvent object and sets the value of each parameter to match
that of the original.
method.return:
A new DataChangeEvent object with property values that match those of the
original.

method.name: toString
method.description:
Returns a string that contains all the properties of the DataChangeEvent object. The string is in the following format:

[DataChangeEvent type=value changeType=value startIndex=value endIndex=value bubbles=value cancelable=value]
method.return: A string that contains all the properties of the DataChangeEvent object.

method.name: changeType
method.description:
Gets the type of the change that triggered the event. The DataChangeType class
defines the possible values for this property.

method.name: endIndex
method.description:
Gets the index of the last changed item in the array of items
that were changed.

method.name: items
method.description: Gets an array that contains the changed items.

method.name: startIndex
method.description:
Gets the index of the first changed item in the array of items
that were changed.

field.name: DATA_CHANGE
field.description:
Defines the value of the type property of a dataChange event object.

This event has the following properties:

PropertyValue
bubblesfalse
cancelablefalse; there is no default behavior to cancel.
changeTypeIdentifies the type of change that was made.
currentTargetThe object that is actively processing the event object with an event listener.
endIndexIdentifies the index of the last changed item.
itemsAn array that lists the items that were changed.
startIndexIdentifies the index of the first changed item.
targetThe object that dispatched the event. The target is not always the object listening for the event. Use the currentTarget property to access the object that is listening for the event.

field.name: PRE_DATA_CHANGE
field.description:
Defines the value of the type property of a preDataChange event object. This event object is dispatched before a change is made to component data.

This event has the following properties:

PropertyValue
bubblesfalse
cancelablefalse; there is no default behavior to cancel.
changeTypeIdentifies the type of change to be made.
currentTargetThe object that is actively processing the event object with an event listener.
endIndexIdentifies the index of the last item to be changed.
itemsAn array that lists the items to be changed.
startIndexIdentifies the index of the first item to be changed.
targetThe object that dispatched the event. The target is not always the object listening for the event. Use the currentTarget property to access the object that is listening for the event.

method.name: initContentContainer
method.description: 组件 容器，不能为空，这个容器，只是为了组件，在显示的时候，不能超出的边缘，比如下拉框，它的显示在最顶层的，为了方便 控制，组件会根据这个容器的进行判断，并自行进行调整， 所以这个容器的的 parent 不能为空，也就是说这个容器必须已经添加到显示列表中。

Event.name: item_renderer_select
Event.description: 项里面的内容 的事件

method.name: List
method.description: 这个有滚动条而以

method.name: createUI
method.description:
distance 阴影的偏移距离，以像素为单位。
angle 阴影的角度，0 到 360 度（浮点）。
color 阴影颜色，采用十六进制格式 0xRRGGBB。默认值为 0x000000。
alpha 阴影颜色的 Alpha 透明度值。有效值为 0.0 到 1.0。例如，0.25 设置透明度值为 25%。
blurX 水平模糊量。有效值为 0 到 255.0（浮点）。
blurY 垂直模糊量。有效值为 0 到 255.0（浮点）。
strength 印记或跨页的强度。该值越高，压印的颜色越深，而且阴影与背景之间的对比度也越强。有效值为 0 到 255.0。
quality 应用滤镜的次数。使用 BitmapFilterQuality 常量：
BitmapFilterQuality.LOW
BitmapFilterQuality.MEDIUM
BitmapFilterQuality.HIGH
有关这些值的详细信息，请参阅 quality 属性说明。
inner 表示阴影是否为内侧阴影。值 true 指定内侧阴影。值 false 指定外侧阴影（对象外缘周围的阴影）。
knockout 应用挖空效果 (true)，这将有效地使对象的填色变为透明，并显示文档的背景颜色。
hideObject 表示是否隐藏对象。如果值为 true，则表示没有绘制对象本身，只有阴影是可见的。
